item.title: Soondubu Tofu Stew
item.description: Adapted from: https://www.seriouseats.com/soondubu-jjigae-korean-soft-tofu-stew-recipe Ingredients 4in piece kombu 1/2 cup small dried anchovies (can substitute dried shrimp) 2 cups very fermented kimchi with juice 1 Tbs vegetable oil 1/2 pound thinly sliced pork belly 6 scallions, finely sliced, greens and whites reserved separately 4 cloves garlic, grated 3 Tbs gochujang 2 Tbs light soy sauce 2 Tbs gochugaru 24 oz soft silken tofu, roughly broken 4 large eggs Directions (see link above)
